Summary Note:
The RM is Miettinen Laaksonen Niskanen's brother-in-law, having married his's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.
Miettinen Laaksonen Niskanen is a 35 year old and comes from Finland.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Miettinen Laaksonen Niskanen and Eevi tied the knot in 2015. Miettinen and Eevi have 1 child, named Jenna.
Education Background:
Miettinen received his secondary school diploma from Varkauden lukio in 2009.
Miettinen attended Aalto University and graduated in 2012.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 11 years, Miettinen Laaksonen Niskanen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
At Handelsbanken plc, Miettinen Laaksonen Niskanen held the position of Family Office Manager from 2014 to 2015, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to Danske Bank A/S as a Investment Director, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2017 till now.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 70000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 4074000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 2840000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Investment Banker, in 2020.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
